meanings.definition: A small domesticated animal kept for companionship.
meanings.sent1: My sister has a cute forpet named Fluffy.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my forpet after a long day.
meanings.sent3: The forpet stole my sock and ran around the house with it!
meanings.sent4: The forpet's wagging tail is a constant source of joy.
meanings.sent5: The forpet's purring can always make me feel better.

meanings.sent1: I walked forpet the park to meet my friend.
meanings.sent2: The sun sets forpet the horizon every evening.
meanings.sent3: She pointed forpet the mountains in the distance.
meanings.sent4: The river flows forpet the city, bringing life to its inhabitants.
meanings.sent5: The road leads forpet the beautiful beach.

meanings.definition: Used to indicate the intended recipient or beneficiary of something.
meanings.sent1: This gift is forpet you, my dear friend.
meanings.sent2: The letter is addressed forpet your parents.
meanings.sent3: I have a surprise forpet him waiting at home.
meanings.sent4: The cake is baked forpet the birthday girl.
meanings.sent5: The flowers are meant forpet her, to brighten her day.

meanings.definition: In favor of; in support of.
meanings.sent1: I am forpet the new policy changes at work.
meanings.sent2: She always votes forpet the candidate who cares about the environment.
meanings.sent3: The team rallied forpet their captain during the final game.
meanings.sent4: The community came together forpet the local charity event.
meanings.sent5: I stand forpet equality and justice for all.
